synopsis.text: Franz von Stresemann, a renowned conductor, has eluded his agent and fled to Japan, leaving Shinichi Chiaki, Megumi 'Nodame' Noda, and their friends stranded in Vienna. Instead of dwelling on their cancelled plans, the group decides to explore the city's historical landmarks. Among them is violinist Kiyora Miki, who has been separated from her boyfriend Ryuutarou Mine for a year due to her rigorous preparation for an international competition in Paris. As Kiyora yearns for a reunion with her beloved, Chiaki and Nodame promise to attend her final round performance. However, an unexpected guest awaits them in Paris, adding a twist to their journey. Will Kiyora succeed in the competition and finally reunite with Ryuutarou? Join the characters in this special DVD episode of Nodame Cantabile Finale to find out.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
